participant_1.background:
I'm passionate about spending time with my family, though it can be difficult at times.
My parents are great, but they don't understand my lifestyle.
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
I treasure my collection of vintage clothing.
I work as a barista, and I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.

participant_2.background:
I come from a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals.
i got married to my highschool friend.
i am a lesbian.
I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.
i still love to line dry my clothes.

content.text: I'm from a small town in the Midwest, too! What was it like growing up there?
It was great! I loved fishing and exploring the woods near my house.
That sounds like fun! I never got to do much fishing, but I loved playing in the woods near my house.
I'm from a small town in Iowa.
What do you do for work?
I'm a barista at a local coffee shop.
Oh cool! I'm a barista too!
That's awesome! I love working in a coffee shop. It's so much fun interacting with customers and making them delicious drinks.
Me too! I love making people happy with my coffee.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
My favorite thing about my job is making people smile. I love seeing people's faces light up when they taste my coffee.
That's so sweet! I love making people happy too.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! We should be friends!
